We stayed in El Born and didn't realize that Xampanyet was a few blocks away.  Samantha Brown featured this place on the Barcelona episode and we just had to try it.  It's on the block where the Picasso Museum is located.  It gets crowded so go early or late.  We found a spot at the bar and cava was served immediately.  The bartenders are awesome.  Attentive and always making suggestions without being pushy.     I'm not an anchovy fan but since Samantha Brown had it, we had to try it too. I bit salty and sour from vinegar but I did enjoy it.  They gave us a sampler of the seafood.  Excellent and we ordered more mussels.  Jamon on bread was great but the star of the night was the tomatoes.  Omg.  Have to get the tomatoes.  3 glasses of cava and all the tapas came out to $27 euros.  We didn't even check prices.  Just start pointing or let them make suggestions.  A really great Barcelona experience.
